name: Kupuu!! Mamegoma (DS)
description:
'Kupuu!! Mamegoma' (otherwise known as クプ～！！まめゴマ) is a virtual pet simulation title for the Nintendo DS. Released on July 16th, 2009 in Japan, it is based on a seal toy brand of the same name ('Mamegoma'), which is managed by San-X. It is the third of four total Nintendo DS titles.

Step into the world of Mamegoma, where you'll find that seals of varying sizes and vibrant colours are plentiful! Raise your own seal pups in their tanks, but this time with a brand new twist: with two grown-up seals ready at bay, you may be able to breed them for different outcomes!

Try to obtain all possible combinations, as you continue to nurture your seals by feeding them a collection of foods (reliant on their likes and dislikes), playing a variety of games, dressing-up in fancy costumes, and entering your seals into ice-breaking competitions.
